type.description:
type
The dimension type

DimensionModeType
The type of dimension this is
    
* Default Value is OVERWORLD
Must be a valid DimensionModeType (use ctrl+space for auto complete!)
type.x-intellij-html-description:
type
The dimension type

DimensionModeType
The type of dimension this is

* Default Value is OVERWORLD
Must be a valid DimensionModeType (use ctrl+space for auto complete!)

script.description:
script
The script to create the dimension mode instead of using provided types
File extension: .engine.kts

Iris Script
Must be a valid scripts (use ctrl+space for auto complete!)

oneOf.description: Typical dimensions. Has a fluid height, and all features of a biome based world
oneOf.x-intellij-html-description: Typical dimensions. Has a fluid height, and all features of a biome based world

oneOf.description: Ultra fast, but very limited in features. Only supports terrain & biomes. No decorations, mobs, objects, or anything of the sort!
oneOf.x-intellij-html-description: Ultra fast, but very limited in features. Only supports terrain & biomes. No decorations, mobs, objects, or anything of the sort!

oneOf.description: Like the nether, a ceiling & floor carved out
oneOf.x-intellij-html-description: Like the nether, a ceiling & floor carved out
